item.title: [INDIGO] InterGlobe Aviation Faces INR 22.20 Crore Penalty and Systemic Reforms by DGCA
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

InterGlobe Aviation Ltd, the parent company of IndiGo, has been issued 8 orders by the Director General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) based on the findings of an Inquiry Committee. The orders include a one-time systemic penalty of INR 1.80 crore for non-compliances under applicable Civil Aviation Requirements (CARs) and a penalty of INR 20.40 crore for continued non-compliance with revised FDTL CAR for 68 days. The company is also required to furnish a Bank Guarantee of INR 50 crore under the ISRAS. The DGCA has issued cautions, warnings, and operational directives to several key personnel. The financial impact from the orders is INR 22.20 crore. The company has restored normal operations following the December 2025 disruptions and is reviewing the DGCA orders.

  • InterGlobe Aviation faces INR 22.20 crore penalty from DGCA
  • DGCA issues 8 orders based on Inquiry Committee findings
  • Company required to furnish INR 50 crore Bank Guarantee under ISRAS
  • Cautions, warnings, and operational directives issued to key personnel
  • Company restored normal operations following December 2025 disruptions

item.title: [INSPIRISYS] Inspirisys Solutions Limited Announces Change in Statutory Auditor's Name
item.description:
Inspirisys Solutions Limited has informed the Exchange about a change in the constitution of the Statutory Auditors as per the LODR Regulations, 2015. The Statutory Auditor of the Company, M/s. MSKA & Associates, Chartered Accountants, has converted from a partnership firm into a Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) under the provisions of the Limited Liability Partnership Act, 2008. The firm is now known as MSKA & Associates LLP, Chartered Accountants bearing ICAI Firm Registration Number 105047W (Old) / W101187 (New). This change pertains only to the constitution of the audit firm and does not result in the engagement of new Statutory Auditors. MSKA & Associates LLP shall continue to act and discharge its responsibilities as the Statutory Auditors of the Company for the remaining period of the approved tenure.

  • Inspirisys Solutions Limited announces change in Statutory Auditor's name
  • MSKA & Associates, Chartered Accountants, converts into a Limited Liability Partnership (LLP)
  • The new name of the Statutory Auditor is MSKA & Associates LLP, Chartered Accountants
  • The change is in compliance with the Limited Liability Partnership Act, 2008
  • MSKA & Associates LLP will continue as Statutory Auditors for the remaining tenure

item.title: [VEDL] Vedanta Ltd's Subsidiary, ESL Steel, Faces Demand Notices for Alleged Shortfall in Fulfilling Production Targets
item.description:
Vedanta Ltd's subsidiary, ESL Steel Limited, has received two Demand Notices from the office of Deputy Director of Mines, Koira Circle, Koira Steel & Mines Department, Government of Odisha. The notices allege a shortfall in fulfilling Minimum Production and Dispatch Targets (MDPA Targets) for the fourth year of operation of two mining leases under the Mine Development & Production Agreement dated November 15, 2021. The total demand amount is INR 12,55,37,61,591. ESL Steel is evaluating the Demand Notices and believes they are not sustainable on merits. The company plans to pursue legal remedies, seek a stay on the Demand Notices, and appropriate reliefs, including quashing of the impugned demands.

item.title: [PWL] Physicswallah Subsidiary Acquires Land for INR 38 Crore to Support Business Expansion
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Physicswallah Limited has informed the exchange about the execution of a sale deed for the acquisition of land by its wholly owned subsidiary, Penpencil Edu Services Private Limited. This is in continuation of the company's earlier intimation about fund infusion of approximately INR 400 crore in Penpencil to support its future expansion plans and strategic investments. Penpencil had previously acquired land for business expansion, and now, it has executed a Sale Deed dated January 17, 2026 for the acquisition of land admeasuring area 1.16 Acres, situated at Village - Tupudana, District Ranchi. The transaction value is INR 38,00,00,000 (Indian Rupees Thirty Eight Crore Only) excluding transfer and other applicable charges and duties.

  • The land is situated at Village - Tupudana, District Ranchi and measures 1.16 Acres.

item.title: [KPITTECH] KPIT Technologies Ltd Receives Request for Reclassification from Promoters Ajay Bhagwat & Ashwini Bhagwat
item.description:
KPIT Technologies Ltd has received request letters for reclassification from promoters, Mr. Ajay Bhagwat & Ms. Ashwini Bhagwat. The two early founders of the company have not been associated with the day-to-day operations for the past two decades and have been pursuing their own independent business interests through Renu Electronics. Their shareholding is now purely financial in nature, with no managerial, strategic, or decision-making role in the Company. The reclassification from 'Promoter' to 'Public' category requires approval from the Board of Directors and both stock exchanges, BSE Limited & National Stock Exchange of India Limited.

  • KPIT Technologies Ltd received reclassification request from promoters Ajay Bhagwat & Ashwini Bhagwat.
  • Ajay Bhagwat & Ashwini Bhagwat were early founders but not involved in day-to-day operations for 20 years.
  • They have been focusing on their own business through Renu Electronics.
  • Their shareholding is purely financial with no managerial, strategic, or decision-making role.
  • Reclassification from 'Promoter' to 'Public' category is subject to Board and stock exchange approvals.
